title: Trendernational Womens' Day 3/8: Meghan/Harry, Allen v Farrow, Burger King, Supporting Women
itunes:title: Trendernational Womens' Day 3/8: Meghan/Harry, Allen v Farrow, Burger King, Supporting Women
description:
On this very special International Women's Day edition Anna Hossnieh and Jamie Loftus discuss the Meghan/Harry interview with Oprah, the Allen v Farrow documentary series, Burger King's problematic tweets, and a discussion on the optics of supporting women vs. actually supporting women.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
